中文法規名稱: 民用航空器噪音管制標準
沿革內容:
1.Full text in 8 articles jointly promulgated in Environmental Protection Administration Order (77) Huan-Shu-Kung-Tzu No.08563 and Ministry of Transportation and Communications Order Chiao-Hang (77) No. 09477 on May 4, 1988.
2.Revisions to Articles 1 and 8 promulgated in Environmental Protection Administration Order (89) Huan-Shu-Kung-Tzu No. 0056631 on October 11, 2000.
3.Revisions to full text in 9 articles jointly promulgated in Environmental Protection Administration Order Huan-Shu-Kung-Tzu No. 0930083349 and Ministry of Transportation and Communications Order Chiao-Hang-Fa-Tzu No. 093B000080 on November 24, 2004.
4.Revision jointly promulgated in Environmental Protection Administration Order Huan-Shu-Kung-Tzu No. 0980061237D and Ministry of Transportation and Communications Order Chiao-Hang-Tzu No 0980085036 on July 16, 2009.

法規內容.條文內容: These standards are determined pursuant to Article 11, Paragraph 1 of the Noise Control Act

Testing of civil aircraft noise levels shall be performed in accordance with effective perceived noise (EPN), A-weighting maximum noise level, or sound exposure level (SEL) regulations in ISO-3891. The units employed are EPN dB, LAmax dB, and SEL dB, respectively.
